thread.title: Hockey cracks down on multinationals
thread.title_full: Hockey cracks down on multinationals | Business Spectator

author: AAP
title: Hockey cracks down on multinationals
text:
Treasurer Joe Hockey has introduced to parliament a package of draft laws that target multinational tax avoidance.
Despite Australia having some of the toughest tax laws in the world, some multinationals continued to avoid paying tax on Australian profits, he said on Wednesday.
"This undermines the public faith in the tax system and that leaves families and small businesses to unfairly carry the taxation burden."
